Industry Experienced

Industries

We have worked with pharmaceutical and biological technologies including cosmetic, chemical healthcare and food industries,Refinery $ steel and power and utilities

In addition we have also offered services in the Energy from waste inustries

Processes

Our Process portfolio includes elements of Research & Development, Manufacturing and Formulation.

We have also done work on emission control, product recover, Upscaling and and down-scaling and optimisatation and intensification.

Services

Our services range from marketing and sales, contract services and technical support.

We offer equipment supply and hire along with lab rental along with services from Skyzack

Expertise

We have over 25 years of experience in the Process Industries including wide application know-how. Experienced with crossover solutions (industry to industry) and a huge contact network

We have also have a huge focus being Customer Oriented

Processes

We specialise in providing solutions in research and development and Formulation Developement including pandcoating, emission control and product recovery
